About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Eliran.Ever since I can remember, I have always loved technology and art. In the military I was in a classified position on a technology team.In 2021 I founded EBS for business programming and technical support. (B2B, B2C)In programming I pass on all the knowledge I have gained during my life in various fields,When you choose me to do a project for you, I stay with you hand in hand throughout the project and evenafter a project I always give technical support you are never alone!

Award One

Commander of the Navy Technology Team, Completion of service with honors

Award Two

Degree in mechanical engineering, specialization in solid mechanics

Award Three

Second-year computer science degree student, outstanding student

Testimonials

Take a look at what my clients say...

My business needed an online store, at the first meeting Eliran was very attentive and gave me support and tips and at the same time built a small sketch that showed me how the site should work and look.Throughout the process was very attentive to the changes I requested and made them immediately.Even after the site went live, Eliran provided technical support and made sure to train some of the employees who would be responsible for entering data and uploading products.Thank you very much Eliran!
